fields.title: Filling hard-to-reach or privacy-sensitive gaps
fields.description: Personify expensive, time-consuming, or ethically fraught to recruit demographies (e.g., teens, high-net-worth individuals, patients with rare conditions).

fields.title: Sensitivity analysis & “what-if” scenario modeling
fields.description: Synthetic personas let analysts tweak age, income, ideology, etc. and instantly see directional effects.

fields.title: Message safety, bias, and fairness audits
fields.description: Detect language that may alienate or misrepresent certain groups before a campaign or product launch.

fields.title: Education & training simulations
fields.description: Students or trainees can practice survey design, interviewing, and data interpretation without needing live respondents.

fields.title: Creative storytelling & interactive media
fields.description: Writers or game designers can populate fictional worlds with believable “public opinion” data.
